title: Google Translate
shortDescription: Translate your site into dozens of languages instantly.
longDescription:
The Google Translate app adds a beautifully designed language dropdown to your site in the location of your choice. 
When the user selects a language, your site will be automatically translated to the language they have chosen.  
Your visitors will be able to select from the dozens of languages Google Translate supports, allowing your website to be understood to visitors from all around the world.
author: Google Inc.

categories.title: Recommended for Blogs
categories.description: Apps for blogs in the recommendation engine.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

autoDisplay.description: Optionally display a banner offering to translate the page into the user’s native language to visitors who do not speak the language your page is written in.
autoDisplay.title: Display translation banner

multilanguagePage.description: If you include text in multiple languages on your page, selecting this option will improve the quality of your translations.
multilanguagePage.title: Page contains content in multiple languages

pageLanguage.description: Specifying the existing language of the page allows Google to show the best possible translations. If your page contains multiple languages, select “multiple languages” inside Advanced Options.
pageLanguage.title: Page language

specificLanguagesToggle.description: Optionally choose a specific list of languages to offer to your visitors.
specificLanguagesToggle.title: Customize languages
